participant_1.background:
My family is supportive and understanding, even though they don't know about my love life.
i have 4 dogs.
I'm not really one for relationships, but my dog has been with me for 10 years.
I enjoy listening to the blues while wearing my hunter green suit.
I enjoy the creativity of Halloween and the joy of weddings.

participant_2.background:
I'm still living with my parents while I save up for my own place.
I like to watch psychological thrillers because they make me think about my own life.
I enjoy sushi because it is delicious and healthy.
i like basketball.
i am an old woman.

content.text: Hey there. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to play video games, listen to blues music, and watch Halloween movies
That sounds fun! I like to play basketball and watch psychological thrillers.
I like the Golden State Warriors. They are really good this year.
I've heard good things about them. I'm not really a sports fan, but I can appreciate a good game.
Yeah, they're really fun to watch. What are some of your favorite Halloween movies?
I like Hocus Pocus, Halloweentown, and Trick 'r Treat.
Oh nice! I've seen all of those. I also like The Nightmare Before Christmas and The Corpse Bride.
Those are great movies too! I love the animation in The Nightmare Before Christmas.
Yeah, it's so cool. I'm excited for Halloween this year.
Me too! I'm going to a party with my friends.
That sounds fun! I'm going to a costume party with my family.
Nice! I hope you have a great time.
